name: King of the Dead
description: In the Palace broke a terrible plague that engulfed the entire population, You are the only survivor who managed to keep the flesh and mind. Your goal is to find an antidote and defeat the plague.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8600GT DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX560 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
